entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local smoke. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 28. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
